# Overview 
:::

The Industry Analyst (IA) Survey harnesses the expertise of representatives from the academic, public, and nonprofit sectors. It includes professionals with deep understanding of market dynamics, technological potential and constraints, and the nuances of policy and regulatory issues.

Each quarter, the survey delivers valuable insights into the industryâ€™s status and outlook, providing essential information for policymakers, investors, and other stakeholders.

This survey is made possible through funding from the European Union's [HORIZON EUROPE](https://research-and-innovation.ec.europa.eu/funding/funding-opportunities/funding-programmes-and-open-calls/horizon-europe_en) research and innovation programme under grant agreement [No 101059632](https://ec.europa.eu/info/funding-tenders/opportunities/portal/screen/opportunities/projects-details/43108390/101059632/HORIZON).
